import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Title } from '@angular/platform-browser'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home-component', templateUrl: './home-component.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home-component.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponentComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private titleService:Title) { this.titleService.setTitle("Inicio | BO Active"); } ngOnInit(): void { localStorage.setItem('token', "3"); } }
